page.title: 05 LOCAL SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: As most of our area is farmland and hillside,there are not very many shops The Main St. of Kilsyth is used by the people of our block for their every-day "messages",but this is not in our area. The shops are quite good for every day needs, but most people travel to other towns,such as Edinbrugh,Glasgow, Stirling,Falkirk & Cumbernauld, to find Super markets and Department Stores In our area we have small local shops which are frequently owned by Indians and Pakistani families.There are about 10/15 small shops in our area of Kilsyth which sell a wide range of goods for everyday use. Mobile shops tour the housing areas from time to time selling groceries and other essential goods.
